summary: Completed comprehensive testing of WhatsApp Admin Panel. All 17 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend pages tested successfully - Login, Dashboard, Users Management, Analytics, System Status, WhatsApp Session, Settings, Activity Logs. Logout and route protection working correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Logout button click intercepted by chart SVG overlay on dashboard page - requires force=True or navigation to another page first

critical_code_review_comments: AdminLogin.js - Missing data-testid attributes on form inputs for better testability
AdminUsers.js - Missing data-testid on Create User button and table action buttons
AdminLayout.js - Logout button positioned at bottom of sidebar may be intercepted by chart overlays on some pages
seed_data_creation: Default admin user created on startup via server.py create_default_admin()
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin panel fully functional. All pages tested: Login (/admin/login), Dashboard (/admin/dashboard), Users (/admin/users), Analytics (/admin/analytics), System Status (/admin/system), WhatsApp (/admin/whatsapp), Settings (/admin/settings), Activity Logs (/admin/logs). Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_admin_api.py cover all admin API endpoints.

features_tested.admin_login: PASS - Login with admin@admin.com / Admin@7501 works correctly
features_tested.admin_dashboard: PASS - Stats cards (Total Users, Total Messages, Sent Messages, Failed Messages), Line chart for Message Trend, Pie chart for Users Status, Bar chart for Top 10 Active Users
features_tested.admin_users: PASS - Users list with CRUD operations, Create/Edit/Delete users, Toggle status (active/suspended)
features_tested.admin_analytics: PASS - Summary cards, Days filter (7/14/30), Bar charts for Daily Message Volume and Top Users Activity
features_tested.admin_system: PASS - Service health cards (WhatsApp Service, MongoDB, API Server), Supervisor Managed Services list
features_tested.admin_whatsapp: PASS - Global WhatsApp Session status, Connection info, How it works section
features_tested.admin_settings: PASS - Rate Limiting inputs, Enable Registration toggle, Maintenance Mode toggle, Save Changes button
features_tested.admin_logs: PASS - Activity logs list, Filter dropdown, Pagination (Previous/Next), Refresh button
features_tested.admin_logout: PASS - Logout clears admin_token and redirects to /admin/login
features_tested.admin_route_protection: PASS - Non-authenticated users redirected to /admin/login when accessing protected routes
